definition: to resist/to obstruct/to hinder/to keep off/to block (a blow)/to get in the way of/cover/gear (e.g. in a car's transmission)

sentences.english: Please move your chair. It's in the way.
sentences.chinese: 請移動下你的座位，它擋路了。

sentences.english: Please move your car, it is in my way.
sentences.chinese: 請把你的車動一下，它擋路了。

sentences.english: Would you please move your case, it is in the way.
sentences.chinese: 你能把你的箱子挪動一下嗎？它擋路了。

sentences.english: Tell that boy not to get in the way.
The damaged truck was in the way, but our driver got round somehow.
sentences.chinese: 撞壞的卡車正擋路，但我們的司機想法繞了過去。

sentences.english: I will protect you and break open the crowds in your way like an ice-breaker in arctic sea.
sentences.chinese: 我要護著妳，撥開擋路的人羣如破冰船行在北極冰洋。

sentences.english: Please take them away, they're in the way.
sentences.chinese: 請把他們拿開，他們擋路。

sentences.english: Are you in the way or are you letting it flow?
sentences.chinese: 你在擋路或你在允許它流動嗎？

sentences.english: Please move the box out of the way.
sentences.chinese: 把這個箱子搬搬家，別擋路。

sentences.english: Human bodies were used beside burning tires and rocks for road blocks.
sentences.chinese: 遇難者遺體就堆放在燃燒的輪胎和擋路石旁。

definition: please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
without a retreat route/caught in a dead end/having burned one's bridges
to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
child bride/girl adopted into a family as future daughter-in-law
